name: SURVIVE.LOOP
description:
This game is a survival game, 

One Player only,

 survive the monsters, 

Take the Boss and win this game,

The Player need to fight the monster until found the last Boss,

When Player clear state and warp to state,

The monster is random number in map ,

The Boss will randaom spawn everywhere on the map,

Kill him and you will won this game!!!! 

*This game is loop , if player want to win found the boss and kill him,
